comments.author: ozone_chain
comments.body: Hey all, Welcome to Ozonechain.io (OZO) Announcement Page!Ozone Chain believes in Quantum secured blockchain for solving the real-world concerns faced by Quantum computers.Ozone Chain is a decentralized platform that enables developers to build scalable user-friendly dApps with low transaction fees without ever sacrificing on security.Ozonechain uses Quantum Random Numbers from a laser source and Lattice-based Post Quantum Cryptography to keep Blockchain resistant to Quantum Computers.Mainnet is Launched and The Future is here.We invite you all to invest in Ozonechain Presale.IEO and listing Partnered with Coinstore Exchange. More Developments and Partnership are lined up.Invest & Stay tuned. Connect with us in Telegram @ozonechainlabs

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Who's behind the project? the team page is not showing anything.EDIT: found it but the footer is leading to a coming-soon page. You should probably fix that.

comments.author: ozone_chain
comments.body: Hello OmegaStarScream,Good day! We are located in Dubai, Singapore and India. We have self funded the complete research and development for the last 18 months and we are here Live with our Mainnet launch.We have a strong incognito quantum tech research scholars working with us.You can find our team here- https://ozonechain.io/team/We have also hired advisors for the project and are in touch with many exchanges for listing and in touch with running projects for future developments.Quote from: OmegaStarScream on May 28, 2023, 09:28:07 AMWho's behind the project? the team page is not showing anything.EDIT: found it but the footer is leading to a coming-soon page. comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: Welcome to the forum and nice to see that you have self-founded the project which is one of the factors that will aid you in fast success in the future, spending 18 months on the project development before going public is enough preparatory stage for any project to build a solid foundation for their journey. So let's see how everything is envolve with this project and also good to see that you picked a good manager to manage your promotions here in the forum.

comments.author: ozone_chain
comments.body: Thank you very much Odusko,Yes, we have worked hard for 18 months to launch the Mainnet. Still a long way to go! We will continue with our long term developments towards sustainability and security!Quote from: Odusko on May 28, 2023, 09:23:25 PMWelcome to the forum and nice to see that you have self-founded the project which is one of the factors that will aid you in fast success in the future, spending 18 months on the project development before going public is enough preparatory stage for any project to build a solid foundation for their journey. comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: I have observed the announcement of the crowdsale possibly taking place in early May, although a specific date has not been disclosed. However, the project's mainnet has already been launched, and there is a steady growth in the number of followers. Given these developments, it raises the question of what factors might be causing a delay in the ICO. i am curious to know how much has been raised thus far I would like to understand the considerations that influenced the choice of platform for the crowdsale.

comments.author: ozone_chain
comments.body: ✨Ozone Chain Team at Wiki Expo, Singapore 2023✨Ozone Chain, the world's first blockchain platform specifically designed to withstand quantum computing attacks, recently received an overwhelming response at the Wiki Expo 2023 held in Singapore. The event showcased the remarkable capabilities of Ozone Chain in addressing the challenges faced by Layer-1 Blockchain systems.Exciting news! Ozone Chain has officially launched its Mainnet, marking a significant milestone in making quantum-resistant blockchain technology more accessible to the industry. Alongside this milestone, Ozone Chain is currently conducting it's Initial Coin Offering (ICO), allowing investors and enthusiasts to participate in this groundbreaking project.During the Wiki Expo, the Ozone Chain team actively engaged with a diverse range of attendees, including veterans, investors, retailers, and industry experts. These interactions helped raise awareness and expand the reach of Ozone Chain within the blockchain community.Overall, the Ozone Chain team is thrilled by the positive reception and is committed to advancing the field of quantum-resistant blockchain technology.😎#wikiexpo #ozonechain #ozo #blockchain #ico

comments.author: ozone_chain
comments.body: Good day Royalfestus,We are self funded project. We have worked hard for 18 months to bring the Mainnet live.Our Presale is live at https://ico.ozonechain.io, we have partnered with Coinstore Exchange for IEO and listing. We are in talk with other exchanges too. We are more focused on ecosystem development, sustenance and security. comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Quote from: ozone_chain on May 30, 2023, 07:50:44 PMOur Presale is live at https://ico.ozonechain.io, we have partnered with Coinstore Exchange for IEO and listing. We are in talk with other exchanges too. I checked website which shows that 2 Presale rounds are  successfully ended with full token sale. after every sale round end the price of token increasing in the next round. Listing date is  August first week according to website announcement. My question is about token distribution and locking period. 1: When will token be distributed and fully unlock (before listing or after)2: will there be full unlocked of token after TGE ?3: Coinstore is good for early start but may i knows there are also big exchange offer ICO like Bitget, bybit, Kucoin, Gate so we can expect Public ICO there or this roadmap is final?

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: You are welcome to the forum. Though I have seen the signature campaign thread, but I have not visited the ANN thread to see the content of the project. I visited the main website of OZONE and I see the literature and it is well explain. I will. Like to know the different between OZO and OZONE. Is it that Ozone is the company or the project name while OZO is the blockchain name? And when I visit the site I was trying to download the ozo wallet on my mobile device but this is what I saw👇And one thing I was thinking was that if the wallet of ozone is not ready then the project is still under maintenance because that is where the OZO will be store. Though I don't know if other devices like desktop and the apple apps are working because I have not tried them.

comments.author: ozone_chain
comments.body: Good day Agbe,Thank you for the invite to the forum and I also thank you for visiting the Ozone Announcement page.Ozonechain is EVM Compatible. You can add Ozonechain to your Metamask and trust wallet using the following details:‍Network name : Ozone Chain Mainnet‍New RPC URL: https://node1.ozonechain.io‍Chain ID : 4000‍Currency Symbol (Optional) : OZOLink: https://ozonechain.io/ozone-mainnet/Our Mainnet is live and you are invited to invest in OZO.Quote from: Agbe on June 01, 2023, 05:22:24 PMYou are welcome to the forum. Though I have seen the signature campaign thread, but I have not visited the ANN thread to see the content of the project. Is it that Ozone is the company or the project name while OZO is the blockchain name? And when I visit the site I was trying to download the ozo wallet on my mobile device but this is what I saw👇And one thing I was thinking was that if the wallet of ozone is not ready then the project is still under maintenance because that is where the OZO will be store. Though I don't know if other devices like desktop and the apple apps are working because I have not tried them. Hi Gladitorcomeback,We are very moderate in spending our tokens. We have not given any massive discounts in presale round, so we have decided to keep the tokens unlocked for the presale buyers. We also know with the kind of upcoming developments, partnerships and listings, Project will reach its peak in 2-3 years time. I hope all investors will hold for good gains and not sell for mere % profits from Presale purchase.We are planning long term incentives for presale buyers by giving them boosters in Staking, free mint in upcoming NFT projects launched in Ozonechain, etc.We are concentrating more on Decentralized developments like Dex, Launchpads, NFT marketplace and Metaverse. We are in talk with EVM compatible projects for partnerships. Listing in CEX should come one by one. We will concentrate on long term development and adoption than rushing into exchange listings. I would invite you and your friends to invest in our project for a secure future.You can contact me in telegram @eris_Crypto if you have any more question, i am there to help.Best regards.Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on June 01, 2023, 01:05:16 AMQuote from: ozone_chain on May 30, 2023, 07:50:44 PMOur Presale is live at https://ico.ozonechain.io, we have partnered with Coinstore Exchange for IEO and listing. We are in talk with other exchanges too. I checked website which shows that 2 Presale rounds are  successfully ended with full token sale. after every sale round end the price of token increasing in the next round. Listing date is  August first week according to website announcement. My question is about token distribution and locking period. 1: When will token be distributed and fully unlock (before listing or after)2: will there be full unlocked of token after TGE ?3: Coinstore is good for early start but may i knows there are also big exchange offer ICO like Bitget, bybit, Kucoin, Gate so we can expect Public ICO there or this roadmap is final?

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Quote from: ozone_chain on June 04, 2023, 10:24:55 AMGood day Agbe,Ozonechain is EVM Compatible. You can add Ozonechain to your Metamask and trust wallet using the following details:‍Network name : Ozone Chain Mainnet‍New RPC URL: https://node1.ozonechain.io‍Chain ID : 4000‍Currency Symbol (Optional) : OZOLink: https://ozonechain.io/ozone-mainnet/Our Mainnet is live and you are invited to invest in OZO.  Congratulations for step forward to the mainnet. I just added Ozone network manually by putting above information. network added successful. i am eager to check transaction speed and fee of this network. I think no dex is currently live for swapping and liquidity adding purpose. Is there any faucet where we could get free fee token foe checking purpose. i will advise also to give signature participants some free token to check this network and give review. MR Sujon is well aware of it.If possible then add Ozonechain network into chain list which will add network to Metamask automatically.https://chainlist.org/

comments.author: TelolettOm
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on June 04, 2023, 10:48:17 AMIf possible then add Ozonechain network into chain list which will add network to Metamask automatically.It is a new project, mate. Every new project will add its network manually. They need to fulfill some requirements or ask Metamask team if Ozonechain network will be available to add automatically. I don't know if Ozone teams have a plan to have a partnership with Metamask. I'm sure Ozone teams have considered this for the future, so we just need to wait for their announcement.  Anyway, congratulations Ozone teams. I see on your telegram announcement channel that you have just got a new strategic partnership with Crypto Pyramid.
